title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 1241.15 - Explosives, dangerous articles and combustible liquids
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 § 1241.15 - Explosives, dangerous articles and combustible liquids

State Regulations

No watercraft carrying explosives (other than ammunition
for small arms or any explosives required by law to be carried by such
watercraft) or inflammable liquids in bulk (having a flash point of 80°
Fahrenheit or lower, open cup test) will be permitted to moor at a terminal, unless permission has been obtained in advance from the Port

Authority. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
§
1241.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
